title: NO FEE Luxury 2 Bd 1.5Ba w/Views, Rooftop Pool, Gym, Full Service
posting_body: ['Sun drenched apartment with STUNNING water and city VIEWS available for rent starting September 1st.', 'This home has an updated galley kitchen with KitchenAid range, dishwasher and Fisher & Paykel refrigerator.', 'The large primary bedroom can come with a king sized murphy bed (or not) and has plenty of room for a full set of furniture plus an office area.', 'The ensuite marble full bath with separate shower/jacuzzi tub will make you feel like you’re at the spa in your own home.', 'The secondary room can be used as a second bedroom or separate office space/guest bedroom.', 'Herringbone wood flooring throughout.', 'The Promenade is a luxury full service gem on the UES!', 'Your apartment comes with access to a pool (can be reserved for private use daily), gym with views (two Pelotons + pilates reformer), sauna, locker rooms, private massage room, 24 hour concierge, doormen, porters, handymen, live-in super, game/playroom, roof top jogging track, business/conference room, large laundry room, dry cleaning services, bicycle room and a large top floor residents lounge.', 'The playroom and lounge can be rented out for private parties.', 'Each have their own kitchen for catering.', 'John Jay park, PS 158 and the East River Promenade are steps away.', 'Central Park, Museum Mile and all the goodness of the UES are knocking at your door.', 'This is a wonderful place to call home!', 'Showings by appointment only.', 'NO BROKER FEE.', 'Cats (max 2) are ok, unfortunately the building will not allow dogs.', '1 or 2 year lease accepted.', 'Reduced rent is available should use of amenities not be necessary.']
